issue.title: examples install fails on OSX El Capitan

content.raw:
Right. But I do not think that it is a good idea to recommend users to turn off System Integrity Protection.
It is easier to change the make file to copy to /usr/local/lib by default.  This is what the other makefiles do.
I manually edited example/build/cmake_install.cmake (which is probably not the right thing to do... but I wanted to check this first)
